Incident Reporting System

❮ ❯

Incident Reporting System designed to manage venues, incidents, offenders, and related data.

This project was quite of a challenge since I didn't have that much of experience in software development in particular. But eventually it helped me to build strong knowledge in TypeScript and Microsoft Azure.

My primary roles were in implementing Account management and Warning management features.

Role

System designer, Project Manager, TypeScript Programmer.

Year

2024

Tools/Technology

TypeScript, Microsoft Azure

Collaborators

Cameron Warton, Julian Hong, Maoyuan Cheng, Zhen Tan
